content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Maryam. I am asking for 650 euros for this apartment. It's a great deal considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. I think 800 euros would be more appropriate for such a prime location and a modern apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, 800 euros is too high. I can meet you in the middle at 725 euros. This is a fair price for this location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. 850 euros is more in line with the current market value and the amenities provided by the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Maryam, 850 euros is too high. I can come down to 775 euros. This is a great price for this apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer. 900 euros is a fair price for such a prime location and a modern apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
